description_en: This dataset provides a summary of key statistics from federal elections, including voter turnout, spoilt votes, and other relevant metrics across different states and seats in Malaysia.
description_ms: Dataset ini menyediakan ringkasan statistik utama dari pilihan raya persekutuan, termasuk peratusan pengundi, undi rosak, dan metrik berkaitan lain di pelbagai negeri dan kerusi di Malaysia.
methodology_en: The dataset compiles election data from various federal election cycles in Malaysia. Data is collected at the national level and includes details such as total voters, ballots issued, ballots not returned, votes rejected, and valid votes. The dataset is a one-off collection and is not updated regularly.
methodology_ms: Dataset ini mengumpulkan data pilihan raya dari pelbagai kitaran pilihan raya persekutuan di Malaysia. Data dikumpulkan di peringkat nasional dan termasuk butiran seperti jumlah pengundi, kertas undi dikeluarkan, kertas undi tidak dikembalikan, undi ditolak, dan undi sah. Dataset ini adalah koleksi sekali sahaja dan tidak dikemas kini secara berkala.
caveat_en: The dataset may contain missing or incomplete data for certain election cycles or seats. Data accuracy is dependent on the sources from which it was collected.
caveat_ms: Dataset ini mungkin mengandungi data yang hilang atau tidak lengkap untuk kitaran pilihan raya atau kerusi tertentu. Ketepatan data bergantung kepada sumber dari mana ia dikumpulkan.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: The date on which the election was held.

fields.name: election
fields.description_en: The identifier for the election cycle (e.g., GE-04 for the 4th General Election).
fields.description_ms: Pengenal untuk kitaran pilihan raya (contohnya, GE-04 untuk Pilihan Raya Umum ke-4).

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: The state in Malaysia where the election was conducted.
fields.description_ms: Negeri di Malaysia di mana pilihan raya diadakan.

fields.name: seat
fields.description_en: The specific seat or constituency where the election took place.
fields.description_ms: Kerusi atau kawasan pilihan raya khusus di mana pilihan raya berlaku.

fields.name: voters_total
fields.description_en: The total number of registered voters for the election.
fields.description_ms: Jumlah pengundi berdaftar untuk pilihan raya.

fields.name: ballots_issued
fields.description_en: The number of ballots issued to voters.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan kertas undi yang dikeluarkan kepada pengundi.

fields.name: ballots_not_returned
fields.description_en: The number of ballots that were issued but not returned.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan kertas undi yang dikeluarkan tetapi tidak dikembalikan.

fields.name: votes_rejected
fields.description_en: The number of votes that were rejected during the counting process.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan undi yang ditolak semasa proses pengiraan.

fields.name: votes_valid
fields.description_en: The number of votes that were deemed valid and counted.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan undi yang dianggap sah dan dikira.

fields.name: majority
fields.description_en: The majority number by which the winning candidate surpassed the runner-up.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan majoriti di mana calon yang menang melebihi naib juara.

fields.name: voter_turnout
fields.description_en: The percentage of registered voters who participated in the election.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan pengundi berdaftar yang mengambil bahagian dalam pilihan raya.

fields.name: majority_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage representation of the majority compared to total valid votes.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan perwakilan majoriti berbanding jumlah undi sah.

fields.name: votes_rejected_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage of total votes that were rejected.

fields.name: ballots_not_returned_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage of ballots that were not returned compared to those issued.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan kertas undi yang tidak dikembalikan berbanding dengan yang dikeluarkan.
